message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[14-Apr-2025 05:51:03 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_talkino_log ( id bigint(20) NOT NULL auto_increment, agent_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, agent varchar(255) NOT NULL, chat_channel varchar(100) NOT NULL, chat_method varchar(100) NOT NULL, is_member varchar(100) NOT NULL, ip varchar(255) NOT NULL, country varchar(255) NOT NULL, chat_date date NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
